mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_user_org (id, user_id, org_id, identity_type, status, join_time, create_time, deleted) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{orgId}, #{identityType}, #{status}, #{joinTime}, #{createTime}, #{deleted})
mapper.select: SELECT uo.id, uo.user_id, uo.org_id, uo.identity_type, uo.status, uo.join_time, uo.create_time, uo.deleted, u.home_org_id AS source_org_id FROM system_user_org uo JOIN system_user u ON uo.user_id = u.id WHERE uo.org_id = #{orgId} AND uo.identity_type = 'EXTERNAL' AND uo.deleted = 0

SELECT uo.id, uo.user_id, uo.org_id, uo.identity_type, uo.status, uo.join_time, uo.create_time, uo.deleted, u.home_org_id AS source_org_id FROM system_user_org uo JOIN system_user u ON uo.user_id = u.id WHERE uo.user_id = #{userId} AND uo.identity_type = 'EXTERNAL' AND uo.deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
